elements artpagenums artpagenums Element
artpagenums &artpagenums.purpose;
&artpagenums.synopsis.gen; Description
This element holds the page numbers of an article as published. Its content is not intended to influence the page numbers used by a presentation system formatting the parent Article.
Processing expectations
&format.inline; &format.csuppress; Although it appears at the beginning of the content model for BlockQuote and Epigraph, it is often output at the end.
&artpagenums.parents.gen; &artpagenums.children.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &artpagenums.example.seealso.gen;.
